Rose Tata-Muya (amụrụ na 12 June n'afọ 1960) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ lara ezumike nká si Kenya bụ onye ọkachamara na 400m hurdles
O ritere ihe nrite na mpaghara kọntinent ma sọrọ soo mpi na Olimpik, World Championships na Commonwealth Games.

Tata-Muya dị naanị afọ iri na anọ mgbe ọ sonyere na asọmupi mba ụwa mbụ ya, 1974 Commonwealth Games, ebe o nwetara ọkwa nke asatọ abụọ: na ọsọ mita 800 na dịka akụkụ nke ndị otu Kenya 4 × 400 mita relay team. Afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, ọ sonyere ọzọ na Commonwealth Games na-eru 800 mita semifinals.

Tata-Muya nwetara ihe nrite ọlaọcha abụọ site na 1979 African Championshionships (400 m hurdles na 800 m). Ọ bụkwa onye nwetara ọla nchara 400m hurdles site na 1982 African Championships. N'afọ 1980, o mere ihe omume dị iche iche na Commonwealth Games, nsonaazụ kachasị mma bụ nke asaa na ndị otu Kenya 4 × 400 m relay. Ihe omume mbụ ya zuru ụwa ọnụ bụ asọmupi mbụ nke ụwa na 1983, ebe ọ na-agafeghị 400 mita mgbochi okpomọkụ Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị Kenya na-eme egwuregwu na Helsinki, ya mere ọ bụ nwanyị Kenya mbụ na-asọmupi na asọmupi ụwa.

Na 1987 All-Africa Games na Nairobi, ọ meriri ọlaọcha karịa 400 m hurdles. N'otu afọ ahụ, o sonyere na asọmupi ụwa nke afọ 1987, ebe ọ ruru ọkara ikpeazụ nke 400 mita. O sonyere na 1988 Summer Olympics, mana ọ gafere mita 400. Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, o mere egwuregwu Commonwealth ikpeazụ ya, na-emecha nke 9 na 400m hurdles.
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi maka ndị otu Kenya
Ọ ka na-eme egwuregwu ochie, ka ọ na-asọmupi na 2007 World Masters Championships na Riccione, Ịtali
Ya na di ya Rod Moody bi na UK, onye bụ onye isi nke ndị otu Kenya na 2002 Commonwealth Games, ebe ọ bụ onye nkuzi
E nyela ya Order of the Grand Warrior of Kenya na Order of the Golden Heart of Kenya
Ọ ka nwere ihe ndekọ 400 mita nke Kenya (dị ka nke 2007).
